description: Deploys an application to an Application Server instance given by the inventory path stored in resourceId field. The actual deployment file content must be appended to this JSON message.

enabled.description: If true, the deployment will be enabled immediately. If false, it will initially be disabled.

serverGroups.description: Comma-separated list of domain server groups where the application is to be deployed. This is ignored if not deploying in a domain.

forceDeploy.description: If true, this forces the content to be deployed even if the content with the same name exists. If false, existing content remains as-is and an error is returned if the deployment name already exists.
